channel.title: Good WebHost, No Ads, Unlimited space
channel.description:
This is a great host i think, no cPanel, uploads can only be 500mb at a time, unless u use an FTP
[b]SmartFtp[/b] [url=http://smartftp.com/download/][DOWNLOAD HERE][/url] ...
[u][b]Webhost Info[/b][/u] [url=http://www.igotfree.com][CLICK ME][/url] - Igotfree.com
[img]http://img475.imageshack.us/img475/8206/whatsincludedwx3.png[/img] ~ ~ ~
Go and sign up, you will need an email to verify it.. except the verification system is [b]HORRIBLE[/b] Either use your email, or a fake email: [url=http://www.tempinbox.com][LINK][/url]
OR just abuse there bad verification system use this:
http://www.igotfree.com/members/validate.php?user=YOURUSERNAMEHERE (not in caps)
and boom verified
now once you login just put your username "usernamehere@igotfree.com" and ur password on the homepage
btw if you need help here ya go just click there "live link" thing or [url=http://www.igotfree.com/phplive/request.php?l=admin&x=1&deptid=0&page=http%3A//igotfree.com/]LINK[/url]
Have fun with unlimited space ;)

item.title: Good WebHost, No Ads, Unlimited space
item.dc:creator: @OnlyOneRule OnlyOneRule
item.description:
@OnlyOneRule wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy:

Rofl, their entire site is down, if you want something unrestraining, you should just use Nationvoice, and if that isn’t enough, don’t be a cheap bastard and buy 2 or 3 dollars a month. Even 9.99 is a good deal.

lol everytime i tried it was down… i thought he put on the wrong link…

Read full topic
